LanguageData.Hay.label: kuru ot
LanguageData.Hay.description: Besin açısından zengin otlar, bitkiler; hasat edilip balyalanmış. Kuru ot hayvan yemidir, ancak zorda kalınırsa insanlar da yiyebilir.
LanguageData.RawHops.label: şerbetçi otu
LanguageData.RawHops.description: Ham şerbetçi otu.. A flavoring and preserving agent that is necessary for making beer.
LanguageData.RawPotatoes.label: potatoes
LanguageData.RawCorn.label: corn
LanguageData.RawCorn.description: Raw corn. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.RawRice.label: rice
LanguageData.RawBerries.label: berries
LanguageData.RawBerries.description: Assorted berries. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.RawAgave.label: agave fruit
